meanings.definition: Not safe; lacking safety or security.
meanings.sent1: The playground equipment looked the unsafest for children to play on.
meanings.sent2: It is important to avoid the unsafest areas of the city at night.
meanings.sent3: The unsafest part of the house was the rickety old staircase.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to walk alone in the dark alley was the unsafest choice she could make.
meanings.sent5: The unsafest bridge in town had warning signs all over it.

meanings.definition: Most lacking in safety or security.
meanings.sent1: The unsafest car in the parking lot had a flat tire and broken windows.
meanings.sent2: Living in the unsafest neighborhood made her anxious all the time.
meanings.sent3: The unsafest roller coaster at the amusement park had everyone screaming in fear.
meanings.sent4: His unsafest bet at the casino ended up costing him all his savings.
meanings.sent5: The unsafest part of the forest was where the wild animals roamed freely.
